mapper.update:
update TSYS_USER
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCK_STATUS = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PASS_MODIFY_DATE = #{passModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_FLAG = #{extFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_FIELD_1 = #{extField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_FIELD_2 = #{extField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_FIELD_3 = #{extField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_FIELD_4 = #{extField4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_FIELD_5 = #{extField5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ORDER = #{userOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
C_IDENTITYTYPE = #{cIdentitytype,jdbcType=CHAR},
C_IDENTITYNO = #{cIdentityno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CREDENTIALS = #{cCredentials,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
